item.title: Re: Ally ability *Mc stripey pants*
item.content:encoded: Op here, I've tried him out over the last two days and i have noticed an increase in the number of times i get the ryo bonus from the gen reaper missions. I will continue to note down by luck but so far out of 18 b-rank gen missions i've had 10 successes with stripey pants in my team could just be a fluke with the rng I'll let you know more when i hit 100 attempts with and 100 attempts with out (Stripey pants that is) :)

item.title: Re: Ally ability *Mc stripey pants*
item.content:encoded: MC Stripeypants doesn't help you find events (this includes reaper Gen ryo bonuses).

item.title: Re: Ally ability *Mc stripey pants*
item.content:encoded:
Quoting the News Archive:

May 18, 2008
'Find Bonus' Double Clarifications: White Eye, and only White Eye (not Epic Dog, Ramen, etc) will help in finding events. The Jutsu is being updated to reflect this.

May 17, 2008
'Find Bonus' Clarifications: Please note that Jutsu and Abilities that double your bonus to find Items / Ninja do *not* help you trigger Bonus Stamina / Ryo / XP events.

While it doesn't necessarially confirm it, and you can still use him in your team if you prefer, I would think that he doesn't. However, it is true that the ability is rather ambiguous, in that it doesn't say items/allies.
